import { translationHelper } from '../../../../helpers/translation-helper'; import { Row, Col, Label, } from "reactstrap" import { AvField, AvGroup } from "availity-reactstrap-validation" import React from 'react'; const AmbientalRiskSection = (props) => { const t = translationHelper('commercial_credit'); return (
{ t("AmbientalRisk") }
 ); }; export default AmbientalRiskSection;
